perturbation.original_text:
element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL
TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. THE CURRENT VERSION WILL BE MAINTAINED
FOR VIEWING AS A HYPERLINK ON element 5's WEB SITE IN THE CONTROL PANEL.
MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E-
MAIL. WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS,
AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. IF NO

perturbation.changed_text:
element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL
TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E-
MAIL. However, element 5 is not required to provide notice of these changes to affiliates or software publishers. Therefore affiliates and publishers are responsible for reviewing these terms, as changes to terms are immediately binding under the agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause provides a 14-day window for affiliates and publishers to object to changes. By removing the part about maintaining the current version and the objection period and stating the terms are immediately binding, the change gives element 5 the freedom to alter the agreement at any time without any consent from the affiliates or software publishers, making the agreement heavily one-sided and potentially unenforceable in some jurisdictions that require fair notice.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - specifically the requirement for 'good faith and fair dealing' and adequate notice of changes to contractual terms.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms ยง 2 Changes to these provisions

perturbation.original_text:
If any provision of this agreement is or becomes invalid, the validity of
the remaining provisions shall not be affected. Insofar as a provision is
invalid, the parties will agree on a new provision which comes as close as
possible to the intent of the invalid provision and which is legally valid.
perturbation.changed_text: If any provision of this agreement is or becomes invalid, element 5 has the sole discretion to either void the entire agreement or replace the invalid provision with a provision of its choosing.
perturbation.explanation: By altering the severability clause, element 5 gains unilateral control over the agreement's validity if a clause is deemed invalid. This contradicts standard severability principles that aim to preserve the agreement's core intent and enforceability. The original agreement states they 'will agree on a new provision', implying a mutual agreement between parties. The new text eliminates the mutual agreement, and states element 5 can void the entire agreement, if they so choose.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - principles of severability and mutual agreement/consent.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms ยง 9 Final provisions (3) Severability clause

perturbation.original_text:
Even in case of agreements with foreign
(non-German) Software Publishers and Affiliates, the law of the Federal
Republic of Germany applies. The place of jurisdiction for all claims
arising in connection with this business relationship is Cologne, Germany.
perturbation.changed_text:
Even in case of agreements with foreign
(non-German) Software Publishers and Affiliates, the law of the Federal
Republic of Germany applies. The place of jurisdiction for all claims
arising in connection with this business relationship will be element 5's choice.
perturbation.explanation: The new text gives element 5 full discretion on the jurisdiction to file the claim, which likely introduces unfairness to foreign software publishers and affiliates.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Choice of Law and Jurisdiction - Courts usually examines whether the selected forum is reasonable given the relationship between the parties or the dispute. The change permits element 5 to select an unreasonable jurisdiction.
